name: lustily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is healthy, energetic, and full of strength and power: The baby cried lustily the moment he was born. She laughed lustily. See
lusty
More examplesFewer examplesFans cheered lustily for their teams.The crowd was lustily singing along with the band.The mayor was booed lustily by crowds along the parade route.
